DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect diabetic knowledge self care behavior ( DSME ) alone DSME plus motivational interviewing glycemic control among child adolescent DM type 1 . Half participant receive DSME along , half receive DSME plus MI .
DOC.brief_title: DSME DSME + MI T1DM Glycemic Control
DOC.criteria: T1DM age 10 year old HbA1C 8 % type DM receive medication may effect blood glucose mental retardation
